title: Will the flexible COVID-19 vaccines take off on the lungs in 4 to 14 months?
subtitle: Sherry Tinbini may wish to use research conducted after 2019 when submitting her next scientifically unfounded claim about COVID-19.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The COVID-19 mRNA vaccines will become lethal a few months after they have been consumed because the antibodies they make have been shown to cause lethal immune reactions that lead to lung damage.
